channel.title: How to run many workstations?
channel.description:
I would like to run one Whonix Gateway and two or more Whonix Workstations / Other Operating Systems. But after studying network settings on Whonix Workstation and reading this https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Other_Operating_Systems, I've noticed that Whonix Workstation uses the hardcoded IP address 10.152.152.11, while for other operating system the hardcoded IP address 10.152.152.50 is recommended by the wiki.
So my question is:
- if I want to run a second/third/etc Whonix Workstation, what network setting does it need? - same question for second/third/etc Other Operating System
Basically, I need to run a few of Whonix Workstations / Other Operating Systems through one single instance of Whonix Gateway **at the same time**. Does the wiki have a guide for doing this?

item.title: How to run many workstations?
item.dc:creator: entr0py
item.description:
Segalla:

I’ve noticed that Whonix Workstation uses the hardcoded IP address 10.152.152.11, while for other operating system the hardcoded IP address 10.152.152.50 is recommended by the wiki.

Those IP addresses are completely arbitrary. IIUC since the network has a netmask of 255.255.192.0 over 10.152.152.0, that means you can use any IP address in the 10.152.128.0 / 18 range (meaning 10.152.128.1 to 10.152.191.254) except for the gateway’s address (10.152.152.10). I’ve only ever tested IPs in 10.152.152.0 / 24. There may be blockers elsewhere, like in the firewall (unlikely).

Read full topic

item.title: How to run many workstations?
item.dc:creator: 0brand
item.description:
Hi Segalla

To my knowledge there is no Multiple Whonix-Workstation Other OS wiki page. However, there is a wiki page on Multiple Whonix-Workstations. You will have to adjust the network settings for the OS you are using.

Whonix

Multiple Whonix-Workstations

Compartmentalization. Better separation of different tasks and/or pseudonyms by using multiple Whonix-Workstations.

Also, you can look for information on the forum search engine. There are multiple threads on the subject and you may find them helpful.

Related:

Whonix

Connections between Whonix-Gateway and Whonix-Workstation

Authenticated / Encrypted Connections between Whonix-Gateway and Whonix-Workstation, ARP spoofing defense, SSH, OpenVPN, Using additional (isolated) n...

Read full topic

I would like to run one Whonix Gateway and two or more Whonix Workstations / Other Operating Systems.   • same question for second/third/etc Other Operating System
